calculator.title_placeholder: Enter the name of the template
calculator.stop_loss_alert: Attention! Your liquidation is above your stop loss. With this ratio, you will get liquidation before your stop is reached
calculator.alert: Warning! Liquidation is too close to the stop loss!

tooltips.volume_tooltip: Amount for which a position is opened, excluding leverage
tooltips.price_tooltip: The quote on the chart at which the position will be opened
tooltips.leverage_tooltip: Leverage allows you to use borrowed funds to trade cryptocurrencies or other financial assets. Always keep in mind that using higher leverage increases the likelihood of your position being liquidated. Liquidation of shoulders in % - x100 (1%)
tooltips.risk_tooltip: Potential loss in % of your position in case of a negative scenario
tooltips.profit_tooltip: Potential profit in % of your position in case of a positive scenario

dialog_close_template.title: Are you sure you want to open a new account?
dialog_close_template.text: Opening a new calculation will clear all entered data and delete the results

dialog_delete_template.title: Deleting the calculation
dialog_delete_template.text: Do you really want to delete the calculation?

dialog_save_template.title: Saving the calculation
dialog_save_template.text: Do you want to update an open calculation or save the calculation as a new one?
